entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near lake Winnipeg overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near lake Winnipeg in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
